stories.title: To Get Good, Go After the Metagame
Applying language models in the real world with Cohere

stories.text:
I stumbled across this game for teaching lambda calculus last week: http://worrydream.com/AlligatorEggs/ â€”and thought it'd be cool to see it executing through software, so I spent a few days building an app to do that.

You can try it here: http://symbolflux.com/lambda-gator/

It's very basic at this point (it will lock up on syntax errors! see limitations in the "ABOUT / INSTRUCTIONS" dialog), but the source is available under MIT license (https://github.com/westoncb/lambda-gator), so maybe it will be of interest to someone.

I also made a video describing how to interpret the visuals etc.: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uiv4bKRZXek
stories.title: Show HN: Simple Lambda Calculus Visualizer
Why do countries welcome some refugees and shut others out?
Scientists use AI to decode pig calls
Most U.S. workers took an inflation pay cut in 2021
Essential Life-Learnings from 14 Years of Brain Pickings (2020)

stories.text:
As of this posting, we are one cent under the record average high for gas prices, with higher prices projected to come. I would qualify this as a economic danger to our economy given it's state.

What can we do? The North Dakota shale oil industry was basically killed by Saudi overproduction/dumping a few years ago.

Lean on OPEC to increase production? Biden and MBS do not get along. They will likely reap profits.

Rollout BEV cars and trucks: not enough supply and not enough recharging.

I believe there is a short-term EV strategy though: the electric bike. With spring/summer coming, I believe the US should institute a 500$ - 1000$ purchase rebate on any electric bike. This is a means of maximizing available battery supply for the best result of transportation. It is the maximum number of EVs for the minimum impact on our grid. e-bikes can assume huge amounts of local trips, and with burlys/trailers, substantial amounts of errands for basic goods.

And it would be a way to directly support the Ukraine, by dropping the price of oil that Putin will use to fund it.
stories.title: Russia-Ukraine oil spike: EV tactical response
